Yorba_Linda.Atwood, Placentia, California: Atwood is a small neighborhood in Placentia, California. It was named for W. J. Atwood, an oil company executive, and was formerly an unincorporated town within Orange County. Its unofficial boundaries are defined roughly as the area of Placentia in the square formed by Orangethorpe Ave., Van Buren St., Lakeview Rd.
